speaker: SPEED
text_entry: SCENE II. Verona. JULIA'S house.

speaker: SPEED
text_entry: Enter PROTEUS and JULIA

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Have patience, gentle Julia.

speaker: JULIA
text_entry: I must, where is no remedy.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: When possibly I can, I will return.

speaker: JULIA
text_entry: If you turn not, you will return the sooner.

speaker: JULIA
text_entry: Keep this remembrance for thy Julia's sake.

speaker: JULIA
text_entry: Giving a ring

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Why then, we'll make exchange; here, take you this.

speaker: JULIA
text_entry: And seal the bargain with a holy kiss.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Here is my hand for my true constancy;

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: And when that hour o'erslips me in the day

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Wherein I sigh not, Julia, for thy sake,

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: The next ensuing hour some foul mischance

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Torment me for my love's forgetfulness!

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: My father stays my coming; answer not;

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: The tide is now: nay, not thy tide of tears;

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: That tide will stay me longer than I should.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Julia, farewell!

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Exit JULIA

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: What, gone without a word?

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Ay, so true love should do: it cannot speak;

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: For truth hath better deeds than words to grace it.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Enter PANTHINO

speaker: PANTHINO
text_entry: Sir Proteus, you are stay'd for.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Go; I come, I come.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Alas! this parting strikes poor lovers dumb.

speaker: PROTEUS
text_entry: Exeunt
